original_title: D A N C E R
overview: Using analog source material, video feeds of a lone dancer and her various physical features, are distorted and warped amongst a variety of colors and textures. A narrative peaks through the static, but held within is her beauty and grace, a crystalline figure gazed upon from afar.
tagline: DELIBERATE AND DELICATE. REHEARSED AND REFINED. SHE IS BUT A DANCE. HER.
title: D A N C E R
